parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add magazines to the cargo space of vehicles, which can be taken out by infantry units.

MP Synchronized

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]] [magazineName, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] - vehicle to add the magazines to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazineName, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]] - magazine name. See [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of magazines to add

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_truck [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]] ["M16", 5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[clearMagazineCargo]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[addItemCargo]], [[addItemCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 7, 2011 - 11:03 (CET)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Bon_Inf*|Bon_Inf*]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Synchronized in [[Multiplayer Scripting#Join In Progress|JIP]] as well.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
